titleInfo.title: Livingston, S. R. J. in Ruskin, Tennessee, to the people of the Ruskin Cooperative Association

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

mods.note: S.R.J. Livingston in Ruskin, Tenn. writes to his "brothers and sisters" at the Ruskin Cooperative Association. Livingston complains there is a conspiracy against him and states that he is leaving but is not an enemy of the RCA.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
